page.description: Reverse the order of the entries in a crlf delimited list.
page.discussion: The Line_ReverseOrder() function reverses the order of entries in a CR-LF delimited string.
page.example: col = a5.Color_Enum() col = word(col, 1, crlf() , 5) ? col = Black Dark Red Red Pink Rose col = Line_ReverseOrder(col) ? col = Rose Pink Red Dark Red Black
